name: RIF - Reactive Intelligence Framework
description: Automatic intelligent development system with GitHub orchestration

SessionStart.command: echo '=== RIF Session Started ===' && gh issue list --state open --label 'state:*' --json number,title,labels,body 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[:5] | .[] | "Issue #\(.number): \(.title) [\([.labels[].name] | join(", "))]"' || echo 'No active RIF issues found'

if [ -f ./knowledge/patterns/recent.json ]; then echo 'Loading recent patterns...'; jq -r '.patterns[:3] | .[] | "Pattern: \(.name) - \(.description)"' ./knowledge/patterns/recent.json 2>/dev/null || true; fi

hooks.command: echo 'RIF: Checking for similar past issues...' && if [ -f ./knowledge/issues/resolved.json ]; then jq -r '.issues[] | select(.similarity > 0.7) | "Similar: \(.title) - Solution: \(.solution)"' ./knowledge/issues/resolved.json 2>/dev/null | head -3 || true; fi

echo 'RIF: Loading quality gates...' && if [ -f ./knowledge/metrics/quality.json ]; then jq -r '.gates | to_entries[] | "\(.key): \(.value.threshold) (current: \(.value.current))"' ./knowledge/metrics/quality.json 2>/dev/null || true; fi

if [[ "$1" == *"npm test"* ]] || [[ "$1" == *"pytest"* ]]; then echo 'RIF: Creating checkpoint before test run...'; mkdir -p ./knowledge/checkpoints && date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ" > ./knowledge/checkpoints/latest.txt; fi
echo 'RIF: Code modified, updating dependency graph...' && echo '{"file": "'$1'", "timestamp": "'$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")'"}' >> ./knowledge/dependencies.jsonl

if [[ "$1" == *"git commit"* ]]; then echo 'RIF: Commit detected, updating knowledge base...'; echo '{"action": "commit", "timestamp": "'$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")'"}' >> ./knowledge/events.jsonl; fi

BASH_EXIT_CODE=$?; if [ $BASH_EXIT_CODE -ne 0 ]; then python3 ./claude/commands/error-analysis.py --analyze-exit-code $BASH_EXIT_CODE --command "$1" 2>/dev/null || echo 'RIF: Error analysis failed' >> ./knowledge/errors/logs/analysis-failures.log; fi

if [ ! -z "$CLAUDE_ERROR" ]; then python3 ./claude/commands/error-analysis.py --capture "Tool execution error: $CLAUDE_ERROR" --context '{"tool": "$CLAUDE_TOOL", "source": "claude_code"}' 2>/dev/null || true; fi

ErrorCapture.command: python3 ./claude/commands/error-analysis.py --capture "$ERROR_MESSAGE" --context '{"source": "claude_code", "context": "$ERROR_CONTEXT"}' --stack-trace "$ERROR_STACK" 2>/dev/null || echo 'RIF: Critical error in error analysis system' >> ./knowledge/errors/logs/system-failures.log

Stop.command: echo 'RIF: Session complete. Updating metrics...' && if [ -f ./knowledge/events.jsonl ]; then wc -l ./knowledge/events.jsonl | awk '{print "Events recorded: " $1}'; fi

/newproject.description: Create new RIF-enabled project with intelligent discovery
